files.patch:
@@ -178,5 +178,3 @@
-  JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_LTO)
-  ifeq ($(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
-    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(LDFLAGS_LTO)
-  else
-    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM) $(LDFLAGS_LTO)
+  JVM_LTO := true
+  ifneq ($(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
+    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += $(CXX_O_FLAG_HIGHEST_JVM)
@@ -185,0 +183,1 @@
+  JVM_LTO := false
